oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hospitality Time - 1942-12-27 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Hospitality Time, originating from WSM. Originally broadcast 1942-12-27, part 2. Featuring Beasley Smith and his orchestra, Sissy O'Brien, Bob Johnstone, Betty (Alcyone Bate Beasley) and the Dixie Dons, and Jerri Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Jerri Sullivan; Sissy O'Brien; Alcyone Bate Beasley; Dixie Dons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces Jerri Sullivan -- I Can't Wait Until Tomorrow (Jerri Sullivan) -- Announcer talks -- Dancing In The Dark (orchestra) -- Announcer introduces Beasley Smith and the band -- Why Don't You Fall In Love With Me (orchestra) -- Announcer introduces Sissy O'Brien -- Mad About Him, Sad About Him, How Can I Be Glad Without Him Blues (Sissy O'Brien) -- Announcer introduces Betty and the Dixie Dons -- Night Train To Memphis (Betty and the Dixie Dons) -- Closing theme -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Hospitality time (Radio program); Smith, Beasley; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Beasley, Alcyone; Johnstone, Bob (Vocalist); O'Brien, Sissy
